description:
Yue and Kero got stuck in their true forms! Sakura needed to figure out a way for them to change back into their temporary forms, but she had a lot of chores to do. Kero was helping her, but ended up making a huge mess with the flour. When Sakura talked to Kero and Yue about Clow Reed, she noticed that Yue seemed to really care about him. Still stumped for a solution to their problem, Sakura received a package of crab in the mail and had a brilliant idea! She decided to use the Shield card to protect Yue and Kero from any outside magic.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Sakura to Futari no Dai Pinch
ซากุระกับวิกฤติของทั้งสอง
さくらと二人の大ピンチ
